analysis: Market analysis indicates balanced conditions with no clear directional bias. RSI at 43.31 remains in neutral territory. Money Flow Index at 45.72 suggests balanced volume distribution. Ichimoku cloud analysis supports bullish bias. Stochastic at 88.93 warns of overbought exhaustion.
